message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $13000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $12500 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $12500. I'll offer you a compromise at $13200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. My final counteroffer for the product is $12800.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $13000, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit. I'll meet you halfway again, and offer you the product for $13400. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. My final counteroffer for the product is $13000.
I'm not willing to sell the product for $13000, Bob. I've already compromised too much. I'll offer you the product for $13100, and that's my final offer.
Considering your final offer, I believe $13000 is the most I can reasonably offer. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
